creator: moe2266us@yahoo.com
text:
folks;
when i try to start Apache-2.0.49, i couldn'
t, and i keep getting this error below:

moe@aix> ../bin/apachectl start
exec(): 0509-036 Cannot load program vendor/Apache_2.0.49/bin/httpd because of 
the following errors:
        0509-150   Dependent module vendor/Apache_2.0.49/lib/libaprutil-0.so 
could not be loaded.
        0509-103   The module has an invalid magic number

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text: 2.0.49 is very old; please try 2.0.55 or 2.2.0.
No feedback, assuming config error long since fixed.

text: seems to have been reopened inadvertently.
